title: FS T206 Pat McCauley Southern League - Very Nice - Sale Pending
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: FS T206 Pat McCauley Southern League - Very Nice - Sale Pending
posts.post_content:
Sale Pending - Thanks for the interest.

Hi,

I have for sale a T206 Pat McCauley Southern Leaguer, scans below. This card is graded SGC 40, but looks much nicer. I think it received the 40 grade because of two light scratches on the front where the P (for Portsmouth) is located. Other than that, the card is very nice.

The price is $125 and that includes insured shipping. I accept a US Postal money order or check. To buy the card, send an E-mail to: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url].

If you are collecting in this grade, you will really like this card.

Sincerely,

Cy
[url]www.cyscards.com[/url]
